results.title: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: This land has cared for our ancestors for generations and now it’s our turn to care for it. We need to take responsibility. This story is about Alisha’s personal connection with the land.

results.title: Peach's Australia : The Dandenongs
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Peach’s Australia”.
The Dandenong’s are the lungs of Melbourne, and an enchanting weekend tourist resort with rare plant and animal life. Its charm is now being eroded by urban sprawl
results.description:

results.title: [The White continent]
results.brief_description:
Please be advised, this film contains graphic footage of animal cruelty.

In late 1949, a joint expedition planned by the Governments of Britain, Norway and Sweden left for Queen Maude Land on the Antarctic continent - this was to be the first truly international expedition to the Antarctic. The film covers the first stage of the journey, from departure point in Europe to the establishment of the base camps and later withdrawal of the ship’s party, leaving the groups of scientists to their study of the unknown world of ice and snow. Photography by Tom Stobart.

results.title: To my dearest beloved one - Shewitey Mearey
results.brief_description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “I said to the doctor, I don’t care if I die tomorrow but I don’t want to leave my daughter alone. He said to me that first I had to live before I could have another child.”
results.title_for_label: To my dearest beloved one - Shewitey Mearey
results.description: A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop “Journeys with Breast Cancer” Created in association with Breast Cancer Network Australia. “I said to the doctor, I don’t care if I die tomorrow but I don’t want to leave my daughter alone. He said to me that first I had to live before I could have another child.”

results.title: Hotline Bling

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.
description_for_label: “Hotline Bling” is a song recorded by Canadian rapper Drake, which serves as the lead single from his fourth studio album Views (2016). The famed music video, inspired by James Turrell’s artworks, was directed by Director X.

results.title: Inside Kendall Jenner’s Cozy L.A. Hideaway

constellations_other.name: Turrell (placeholder)
constellations_other.description: James Turrell's immersive artworks have an unusual connection with both hip hop music and reality TV royalty.

results.description: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.
description_for_label: Kendall Jenner welcomes Architecture Digest for a tour of her serene LA home. Just off the entry, a signature James Turrell ovoid wall sculpture greets visitors with a dreamy chromatic display, the first of many personal artistic accents woven throughout her home.
